about.description:
Send to VRC is a free open-source tool that allows you to easily share images in VRChat.
Images are converted into a format that can be displayed in VRChat and uploaded to a cloud service.
The uploaded image URL can be copied to the clipboard and pasted into a video player or image viewer within VRChat.
about.author: Author
about.thirdparty-license.description: This software is built using various open-source components. For details, please see the files in the licenses folder.
about.notice.description: Send To VRC is a software created by Catherine. It is not endorsed, authorized, affiliated with, or recommended by VRChat Inc. VRChat is a registered trademark of VRChat Inc. Catherine and the developers of this software assume no responsibility for any damages arising from or related to the use of Send to VRC
send.copy-on-upload.description: Copy the URL to the clipboard upon upload completion.
send.send-to-video-player.description: Upload to the cloud service as a video
send.send-to-image-viewer.description: Upload to the cloud service as an image
send.send-to-image-viewer.please-paste-u: Please paste the URL into the image viewer.
send.send-to-video-player.please-paste-u: Please paste the URL into the video player (Live mode)
send.failed-to-load:
Failed to load specified file.
Please specify another file.
send.tos.description: The uploader requires you to agree to the following terms. Do you agree?
send.print-to-vrchat-print.share-instruc: Please use the Print feature to share.
send.print-to-vrchat-print.vrchat-api-ke: VRChat API key is not configured. Please set it in vrchatApiKey in configuration file.
